text: Ahmed Daham Karim (12 October 1967 â€“ 29 December 2021) was an Iraqi football midfielder. He played for the Iraq national football team from 1987 until 1996. He also played for Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya and last coached Al-Ramadi FC. His managing career lasted from 2015 until his death. Daham died from a heart attack in Ramadi, Iraq on 29 December 2021, at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Football managers
title: Ahmed Daham
